thread.title: Lisa Appleton squeezes her boobs and writhes on the sand during bikini beach day in Spain
thread.title_full: Lisa Appleton squeezes her boobs and writhes on the sand during bikini beach day in Spain

author: Lara Martin
title: Lisa Appleton squeezes her boobs and writhes on the sand during bikini beach day in Spain
text:
Lisa Appleton squeezes her boobs and writhes on the sand during bikini beach day in Spain She's enjoying a sunshine break with Ibiza Weekender's Imogen Townley Share Lisa Appleton escapes the January snow with a winter sun holiday In Spain (Photo: XPOSURE)   
Lisa Appleton ’s been up to her old tricks this week, squeezing into a teeny bikini to sashay along a Benidorm beach. 
The former Big Brother housemate was snapped splashing around in the ocean, writhing on the sand and giving her boobs a good juggle. 
Making sure she was noticed, the reality star played around in the waves, thrust her chest out and twisted round to give photographers a good look at her rear end. Lisa's escaped the winter chill by jetting to Spain (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) 
At one point the 48-year-old stopped to adjust her bikini top and avoid a wardrobe malfunction. 
She looked more than happy to be soaking up a bit of sunshine, especially after hearing about the snowy weather back in the UK. 
“My word just seen all the blizzard pics about uk weather horrendous, stay safe everyone! I'm lapping it up in Spain but feel it for you all,” she tweeted. 
Lisa’s become a paparazzi fixture in recent weeks, happily posing up a storm no matter what she’s doing. 
Taking the bins out in just her underwear? Done that. 
Stripping to her bra inside a phone box? Old news! 
Humping a bollard on a night out? Been there. 
Lisa’s on a girls’ holiday in Spain with Ibiza Weekender star Imogen Townley and admitted yesterday they’d enjoyed a “crazy wild night” on the town. 
Just before leaving, Lisa appeared on Celebrity Big Brother ’s Bit On The Side where she poked fun at her headline-grabbing photo ops. 
Never afraid of flashing the flesh, the former Big Brother contestant poked fun at her penchant for scantily-clad pictures by taking out the Bit On The Side bins and fixing host Rylan Clark-Neal’s car while wearing nothing but her undies. Just casually pumping a tyre in her underwear (Photo: Channel 5) She didn't look too impressed with the state of the BOTS bins (Photo: Channel 5) Her skit was aired on BOTS last week (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Share this video Watch Next 
Lisa was introduced by Rylan as "Warrington's answer to Kim Kardashian" and made her entrance in a red lacy dress. 
“No one has had more column inches over the last twelve months. She has been in the papers every single day, everyone is fascinated by her every move. She really is Warrington’s answer to Kim Kardashian,” said Rylan. 
During the first ad break, she did a quick change into her sexy lingerie and proceeded to wheel out the bins, poking fun at those now-infamous photos of her doing the exact same thing outside her own home. 
Later in the show she was back in her undies, playing mechanic as she attempted to pump air into a tyre on Rylan’s car. Lisa's never afraid to flash the flesh (Photo: Channel 5) Giving viewers an eyeful! (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch: Lisa Appleton recreates her 'famous' bin moment Share this video Watch Next 
Viewers had a mixed reaction on social media; while plenty said the antics had them in stitches others weren’t as impressed. 
Lots of people praised Lisa for being a “good sport” and called the segment funny, congratulating her via Twitter and suggesting she’d be a great permanent addition to BOTS. 
One even said: "I don't understand Lisa Appleton's newfound fame but it was definitely the best thing about 2016 #cbb #cbbbots (sic)" 
But others weren’t as complimentary, with one tweeting: “Argh my eyes!" Lisa slipped into a slinky dress for the rest of the show (Photo: Channel 5) 
Others clearly hadn’t watched the ninth series of civilian Big Brother back in 2008 as they admitted not having a clue who Lisa was. 
One confused viewer asked: “Can someone please tell me who Lisa Appleton is? #CBBBOTS #CBB I feel like I should know but have no clue. X factor?” 
Another said: “Big fanfare and entrance on #CBBOTS for Lisa Appleton . Once it is over, I reach to google to find out who the hell she is. (sic)” 
Lisa was joined on the panel by former Loose Woman Denise Welch, astrologer Russell Grant and The Apprentice candidate Jessica Cunningham . 
CBB continues 9pm on Channel 5. Like us on Facebook
